GST rationalization can act as a dual stimulus — reducing prices for consumers while unlocking higher sales volumes for industries.
If implemented smoothly, this could be the most impactful GST reform since its launch in 2017.

TVS MOTOR

MARUTI

Top 10 firms (TCS, Infosys, RIL, HDFC Bank, ITC) account for >50% of the total!! A  narrow profit base 24x PE vs historical 21.9x partly explains FII exit https://t.co/TQoONjINOm

HYUNDAI
Hyundai Motor India: Breakout from a falling trendline on weekly; Strong RS ; higher highs above 20W EMA. A weekly close >₹2,270 can extend to ₹2,380–₹2,450. Base intact at ₹1,970/₹1,934. #HyundaiIndia  #NiftyAuto #NSE #PriceAction #hyundai #NIFTY50 #NIFTY #NIFTYAUTO  #cnxauto #Trending #Trump #TrumpPutinSummit #TarrifsonIndia #INDIA #Alaska #AlaskaSummit #AlaskaMeeting #Ukraine

HEROMOTOCO
Hero MotoCorp: Weekly range breakout above ₹4,460 with rising volumes; 20W EMA rising. Sustain >₹4,460 keeps ₹4,950–₹5,200 in play. Risk defined at ₹4,460 / ₹4,350. #HEROMOTOCO #NiftyAuto #NSE #Technicals
#NIFTY50 #NIFTY #NIFTYAUTO #cnxauto #Trending #Trump #TrumpPutinSummit #TarrifsonIndia #INDIA #Alaska #AlaskaSummit #AlaskaMeeting #Ukraine #heromotocorp

📊 #Nifty50 (1D)

💡Price action is at a make-or-break zone

- Failed breakout at the top — showing supply pressure near all-time highs.  
- Previous breakout levels have flipped into resistance.  
- Immediate support zone is still intact, but the breakdown follow-through is missing.  
- Sellers likely to be active in the 24,700 – 25,200 zone.  
- If support breaks, potential downside toward 23,750 – 23,300.  

⚡ Nifty at crossroads. Next big move = once this range breaks.
